answerText: France [or Francais][10] This French author wrote separate plays about the post-Trojan War exploits of the widow of Hector and of the wife of Theseus in Andromaque and Phedre.
heading: Illinois Fall Touranment |2012 | 5 | 2 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Autobiographical works from this country include If it Die and In Search of Lost Time. For 10 points each: [10] Name this European country home to the character of Rastignac, who appears in many sections of Honore de Balzac's The Human Comedy.France [or Francais]
